mapper.select: SELECT report_time, result_code, result_msg, egg_hist_no, business_no, license_no, client_business_no, client_license_no, farm_id_no, egg_usage, spawning_date, storage_method, egg_xxl, egg_xl, egg_l, egg_m, egg_s, egg_e, washing_method, report_date, farm_uniq_no FROM mtrace.history_number WHERE result_code = "INFO-0000"

SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over ( ORDER BY report_time asc ) as num, ROW_NUMBER() over ( ORDER BY report_time desc ) as idx, report_time, result_code, result_msg, egg_hist_no, business_no, license_no, client_business_no, client_license_no, farm_id_no, egg_usage, spawning_date, storage_method, egg_xxl, egg_xl, egg_l, egg_m, egg_s, egg_e, washing_method, report_date, farm_uniq_no FROM mtrace.history_number ) a order by a.num asc ) b where b.idx between #{startrow} and #{startrow}+4

SELECT report_time, result_code, result_msg, egg_hist_no, business_no, license_no, client_business_no, client_license_no, farm_id_no, egg_usage, spawning_date, storage_method, egg_xxl, egg_xl, egg_l, egg_m, egg_s, egg_e, washing_method, report_date, farm_uniq_no FROM mtrace.history_number WHERE spawning_date = #{spawningDate}
